panels.title: Number of Pending or Terminated Containers

targets.expr: label_join(sum(spcs_container_state_running{snow_containers_compute_pool_name="$snow_containers_compute_pool_name"}) by (snow_database_name, snow_schema_name, snow_executable_name, snow_containers_container_name, snow_containers_instance_name, reason), "join_label", ";", "snow_database_name", "snow_schema_name", "snow_executable_name", "snow_containers_container_name", "snow_containers_instance_name", "reason")

label_join(sum(spcs_container_state_pending{snow_containers_compute_pool_name="$snow_containers_compute_pool_name"}) by (snow_database_name, snow_schema_name, snow_executable_name, snow_containers_container_name, snow_containers_instance_name, reason), "join_label", ";", "snow_database_name", "snow_schema_name", "snow_executable_name", "snow_containers_container_name", "snow_containers_instance_name", "reason")

label_join(sum(spcs_container_state_finished{snow_containers_compute_pool_name="$snow_containers_compute_pool_name"}) by (snow_database_name, snow_schema_name, snow_executable_name, snow_containers_container_name, snow_containers_instance_name, reason), "join_label", ";", "snow_database_name", "snow_schema_name", "snow_executable_name", "snow_containers_container_name", "snow_containers_instance_name", "reason")

label_join(sum(spcs_container_state_last_finished_reason{snow_containers_compute_pool_name="$snow_containers_compute_pool_name"}) by (snow_database_name, snow_schema_name, snow_executable_name, snow_containers_container_name, snow_containers_instance_name, reason), "join_label", ";", "snow_database_name", "snow_schema_name", "snow_executable_name", "snow_containers_container_name", "snow_containers_instance_name", "reason")

label_join(sum(spcs_container_state_pending_reason{snow_containers_compute_pool_name="$snow_containers_compute_pool_name"}) by (snow_database_name, snow_schema_name, snow_executable_name, snow_containers_container_name, snow_containers_instance_name, reason), "join_label", ";", "snow_database_name", "snow_schema_name", "snow_executable_name", "snow_containers_container_name", "snow_containers_instance_name", "reason")

label_join(sum(spcs_container_status_unschedulable{snow_containers_compute_pool_name="$snow_containers_compute_pool_name"}) by (snow_database_name, snow_schema_name, snow_executable_name, snow_containers_container_name, snow_containers_instance_name, reason), "join_label", ";", "snow_database_name", "snow_schema_name", "snow_executable_name", "snow_containers_container_name", "snow_containers_instance_name")
